text:
Demanding action against an AIADMK councillor, a couple along with DMK cadre picketed the Ammapet police station here on Monday. Vimalarani (32) of Namamalai in Ward 37 was not given the freebies. She approached ward councillor Subramani on Monday.

It is said that the councillor abused her and pushed her out of his house.

Her husband Thangavel was also allegedly beaten by the councillor.

The couple lodged a complaint with the Ammapet police station. Around 30 DMK cadre came in support of the couple and picketed the station.

They demanded action against the councillor and his wife for unruly behaviour.

Power shutdown

As the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation will undertake maintenance works at its Mettupatti power station on February 12, there will be no power supply in the following areas between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m.: Mettupatti, Karipatti, Seshanchavadi, Muthampatti, Vellalagundam, Kootathupatti, Chinna Goundapuram and S.N. Mangalam.
title: DMK cadre picket police station
